pr_title: Add switch of DocMs step on each artifact

timeline.message: Add switch of skipDocMs step on each artifact

timeline.bodyText: Why can you not do this in the if statement at template time?
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -147,7 +147,7 @@ stages:
           - ${{if ne(artifact.options.skipPublishDocs, 'true')}}:
             - deployment: PublicDocsMs
               displayName: "Publish Updates for Docs.MS"
-              condition: and(succeeded(), ne(variables['Skip.PublishDocs'], 'true'))
+              condition: and(succeeded(), ne(variables['Skip.PublishDocs'], 'true'), ne(artifact.skipDocMs, 'true'))

replies.bodyText:
I did not skip it successfully for the first run. But it skips the step after kicking off another build.
I will move to the if clause.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText:
https://dev.azure.com/azure-sdk/internal/_build/results?buildId=532666&view=results
It indicates put it under if clause works well
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: Do we want to control this by DocMs parameter only? GithubIO is still using options.skipPublishDocs. Then we have two vars for two doc steps.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: I'd change the github.io publishing skipPublishDocGithubIo and we probably should remove the "options." from all these conditions.
replies.author: weshaggard

timeline.bodyText: Same Integration skip question as seen in the other languages..
timeline.author: scbedd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -209,7 +209,7 @@ stages:
                           # we override the regular script path because we have cloned the build tools repo as a separate artifact.
                           ScriptPath: 'eng/common/scripts/copy-docs-to-blobstorage.ps1'
 
-          - ${{if ne(artifact.options.skipUpdatePackageVersion, 'true')}}:
+          - ${{if ne(artifact.skipUpdatePackageVersion, 'true')}}:
             - deployment: UpdatePackageVersion
               displayName: "Update Package Version"
               condition: and(succeeded(), ne(variables['Skip.UpdatePackageVersion'], 'true'))

replies.bodyText: Talked offline. Will add check on integration step here as well.
replies.author: sima-zhu

timeline.message: Added artifact level skip publish dev feed

timeline.bodyText: This looks like a copy/past issue.
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,7 +48,7 @@ stages:
   - ${{if and(eq(variables['Build.Reason'], 'Manual'), eq(variables['System.TeamProject'], 'internal'))}}:
     - ${{ each artifact in parameters.Artifacts }}:
       - stage: Release_${{artifact.safeName}}
-        displayName: 'Release: ${{artifact.name}}'
+        displayName: 'Release: ${{artifact.name}}__${{artifact.skipPublishDevFeed}}'

timeline.bodyText: I'm fine with this for testing but we should undo it before merging this PR.
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,3 +30,4 @@ extends:
       - name: azure-sdk-template
         groupId: com.azure
         safeName: azuresdktemplate
+        skipPublishDevFeed: true

timeline.message: Added artifact level skip publish dev feed
